data.actual_result: Box works as normal, doesn't open on click nor show any icon on hover.
data.expected_result: The box to be greyed out/show a stop cursor on hover
data.short_description: The dropdown to change the channel for welcome messages/AFK channel doesn't have any effect if you've no permission to change it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server and invite a friend. - Give the friend a role that has **manage_roles** and **manage_messages** but DOESN'T have **manage_server** - Get the friend to attempt to edit the default welcome message dropdown box
